publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-19.1 Mr David Davidson: As an amendment to the motion (S1M-19) in the name of Ross Finnie, add at end "The Parliament furthermore deplores the failure of Scottish Westminster MPs to defend Scotland’s interests in the Third Standing Committee on Delegated Legislation (23 March 1999), when the Scottish Minister for Home Affairs, Devolution and Transport moved to remove 6000 square miles of North Sea out of Scottish jurisdiction." Supported by: Murray Tosh, Alex Fergusson, Annabel Goldie, David McLetchie, Phil Gallie, Alex Johnstone
